metadata.name: Beth's Heart
metadata.description:
The cut familiar has been revamped! Will you be able to find it? What strategies can you devise? So many questions, and only one way to find the answers!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tp9LIOS.png[/img]
[b][h1]𝐁𝐞𝐭𝐡'𝐬 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭[/h1][/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/805iA62.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/yufiJhE.png[/img] Trinket that spawns a familiar which converts soul/black hearts into battery charges and stores them for future usage [img]https://i.imgur.com/yufiJhE.png[/img]
[u]𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐮𝐬𝐞[/u] [list] [*][b]Double tap[/b] an arrow key to shoot Beth's Heart forward. If the familiar hits a soul/black heart, it will consume and convert it into battery charges [*]Press the [b]Control[/b] key to draw charges from Beth's Heart
[u]𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐬[/u]
[list] [*]Maximum storage = 6 pips [*]Maximum storage with BFFS!
